00030 bool OctreeUtilities::compare_to_squared_radius(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree>& octree,const Vector3d& pos, float sq_radius){
00031 
00032     Vector3d center = octree->center();
00033     float x = center(0) - pos(0);
00034     float y = center(1) - pos(1);
00035     float z = center(2) - pos(2);
00036 
00037     return x*x + y*y + z*z < sq_radius ;
00038 
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 float OctreeUtilities::calculate_squared_dist(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree>& octree,const Vector3d& pos){
00043     Vector3d center = octree->center();
00044         float x = center(0) - pos(0);
00045         float y = center(1) - pos(1);
00046         float z = center(2) - pos(2);
00047 
00048         return x*x + y*y + z*z ;
00049 }

00052 
00053 std::set<OctreeUtilities::RobotRef > OctreeUtilities::get_visible_robots_by_radius(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree> &octree,
00054                                                                                     const Vector3d & pos,
00055                                                                                     float view_radius){
00056 
00057     std::set<OctreeUtilities::RobotRef > found_robots;
00058 
00059     // do the real work
00060     get_visible_robots_by_radius_Rec(octree, found_robots, view_radius*view_radius, pos);
00061 
00062     return found_robots;
00063 }
00064 
00065  void OctreeUtilities::get_visible_robots_by_radius_Rec(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree> &octree,
00066                                                         std::set<OctreeUtilities::RobotRef > & robots_found,
00067                                                         float sq_radius,
00068                                                         const Vector3d & pos ) {
00069 
00070      // check all robots in this node
00071      if(octree->robot_datas().size() > 0){
00072 
00073          // get robot datas and iterator
00074          vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robots = octree->robot_datas();
00075          vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> >::const_iterator it_robots;
00076 
00077          for(it_robots = robots.begin(); it_robots != robots.end(); it_robots++ ){
00078 
00079              Vector3d rob_pos = (*it_robots)->position();
00080 
00081              float x = rob_pos(0) - pos(0);
00082              float y = rob_pos(1) - pos(1);
00083              float z = rob_pos(2) - pos(2);
00084 
00085              // check whether this robot is near enough
00086              if(x*x + y*y + z*z < sq_radius){
00087                  //robots_found.insert( *const_cast<boost::shared_ptr<RobotIdentifier> * >( &((*it_robots)->robot().id()) ) );
00088                  //robots_found.insert(reinterpret_cast<boost::shared_ptr<RobotIdentifier> >((*it_robots)->robot().id()) );
00089                  robots_found.insert(boost::shared_ptr<RobotIdentifier>((*it_robots)->robot().id()));
00090              }
00091          }
00092 
00093 
00094      }
00095 
00096      // is this a leaf?
00097      if(octree->sub_divided()){
00098 
00099          // visit each node which has a distance at most the radius
00100          for(int child_num = 0; child_num < 8; child_num++){
00101 
00102              if(compare_to_squared_radius(octree->child( child_num ),pos,sq_radius)){
00103 
00104                  get_visible_robots_by_radius_Rec(octree->child( child_num ), robots_found, sq_radius, pos);
00105              }
00106 
00107          }
00108 
00109 
00110      }
00111 
00112  }

00114  std::set<OctreeUtilities::MarkerRef> OctreeUtilities::get_visible_markers_by_radius(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree> &octree,
00115                                                                                      const Vector3d & pos,
00116                                                                                      float view_radius) {
00117 
00118     std::set<OctreeUtilities::MarkerRef > found_markers;
00119 
00120     get_visible_markers_by_radius_Rec(octree, found_markers, view_radius*view_radius, pos);
00121 
00122     return found_markers;
00123  }

00126   void OctreeUtilities::get_visible_markers_by_radius_Rec(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree> &octree,
00127                                                           std::set<OctreeUtilities::MarkerRef > & markers_found,
00128                                                           float sq_radius,
00129                                                           const Vector3d & pos ) {
00130 
00131 
00132      if(octree->marker_information().size() > 0){
00133          vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers = octree->marker_information();
00134          vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> >::const_iterator it_markers;
00135          for(it_markers = markers.begin(); it_markers != markers.end(); it_markers++ ){
00136 
00137              Vector3d rob_pos = (*it_markers)->position();
00138 
00139              float x = rob_pos(0) - pos(0);
00140              float y = rob_pos(1) - pos(1);
00141              float z = rob_pos(2) - pos(2);
00142 
00143              if(x*x + y*y + z*z < sq_radius){
00144 
00145                  markers_found.insert( MarkerRef( reinterpret_cast<const MarkerRef &> ((*it_markers)->id() )) );
00146              }
00147          }
00148 
00149 
00150      }
00151 
00152      if(octree->sub_divided()){
00153 
00154          for(int child_num = 0; child_num < 8; child_num++){
00155 
00156              if(compare_to_squared_radius(octree->child( child_num),pos,sq_radius)){
00157 
00158                  get_visible_markers_by_radius_Rec(octree->child(child_num), markers_found, sq_radius, pos);
00159              }
00160 
00161          }
00162 
00163 
00164      }
00165 
00166   }

00170   std::set<OctreeUtilities::ObstacleRef> OctreeUtilities::get_visible_obstacles_by_radius( const boost::shared_ptr<Octree> &octree,
00171                                                                                            const Vector3d & pos,
00172                                                                                            float view_radius) {
00173 
00174     std::set<OctreeUtilities::ObstacleRef > found_obstacles;
00175 
00176     get_visible_obstacles_by_radius_Rec(octree, found_obstacles, view_radius, pos);
00177 
00178     return found_obstacles;
00179   }
00180 
00181 
00182  void OctreeUtilities::get_visible_obstacles_by_radius_Rec(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree> &octree,
00183                                                            std::set<OctreeUtilities::ObstacleRef > & obstacles_found,
00184                                                            float radius,
00185                                                            const Vector3d & pos ) {
00186 
00187 
00188      if(octree->marker_information().size() > 0){
00189          vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles = octree->obstacles() ;
00190          vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> >::const_iterator it_obstacles;
00191          for(it_obstacles = obstacles.begin(); it_obstacles != obstacles.end(); it_obstacles++ ){
00192 
00193              Vector3d rob_pos = (*it_obstacles)->position();
00194 
00195              float x = rob_pos(0) - pos(0);
00196              float y = rob_pos(1) - pos(1);
00197              float z = rob_pos(2) - pos(2);
00198 
00199              float obstacle_width = octree->determine_obstacle_max_size((*it_obstacles));
00200              float r = radius + obstacle_width;
00201              r*=r;
00202 
00203              if(x*x + y*y + z*z < r){
00204 
00205                  obstacles_found.insert( ObstacleRef(reinterpret_cast<const ObstacleRef &> ( (*it_obstacles)->id() ) ) );
00206              }
00207          }
00208 
00209 
00210      }
00211 
00212      if(octree->sub_divided()){
00213 
00214          for(int child_num = 0; child_num < 8; child_num++){
00215 
00216              if(compare_to_squared_radius(octree->child( child_num ) , pos, radius)){
00217 
00218                  get_visible_obstacles_by_radius_Rec(octree->child(child_num), obstacles_found, radius, pos);
00219              }
00220 
00221          }
00222 
00223 
00224      }
00225 
00226    }

00229  std::set<OctreeUtilities::RobotRef> OctreeUtilities::get_nearest_robots(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree> &octree,
00230                                                                          const Vector3d &pos,
00231                                                                          const RobotRef & id,
00232                                                                          std::size_t num_nearest) {
00233 
00234      // create an empty queue
00235      PriorityQueue<RobotRef>::Type queue;
00236 
00237      // find nearest robots
00238      get_nearest_robots_Rec(octree, pos,num_nearest, queue, id);
00239 
00240      // calculate the set
00241      std::set<RobotRef> found_robots;
00242 
00243      while(!queue.empty() ){
00244          found_robots.insert( RobotRef(queue.top()->id() ) );
00245          queue.pop();
00246 
00247      }
00248 
00249 
00250      return found_robots;
00251 
00252 
00253  }
00254 
00255 void OctreeUtilities::get_nearest_robots_Rec(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree>& octree,
00256                                              const Vector3d &pos,
00257                                              std::size_t num_nearest,
00258                                              PriorityQueue<RobotRef>::Type & queue,
00259                                              const RobotRef & id){
00260 
00261     Identifier::Comp comp;
00262     // leaf
00263      if( octree->sub_divided() == false ){
00264 
00265          // get the robot datas stored in this node and an iterator for them
00266          std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robots = octree->robot_datas();
00267 
00268          std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> >::iterator it_robots;
00269 
00270          std::size_t num_robots_found = queue.size();
00271 
00272          float farest_dist = 99999999;
00273 
00274          if(num_robots_found > 0){
00275              farest_dist  = queue.top()->dist();
00276          }
00277 
00278          // check all robots in this node
00279          for(it_robots = robots.begin(); it_robots != robots.end(); ++it_robots){
00280 
00281              // don't add the id of the robot we are doing the search for
00282              if(! comp((*it_robots)->robot().id(), id ) &&
00283                      ! comp( id, (*it_robots)->robot().id() ) ){
00284                  continue;
00285              }
00286 
00287              Vector3d robot_pos = (*it_robots)->position();
00288              float x = pos(0) - robot_pos(0);
00289              float y = pos(1) - robot_pos(1);
00290              float z = pos(2) - robot_pos(2);
00291 
00292              float dist = std::sqrt(x*x + y*y + z*z );
00293 
00294              if(num_robots_found < num_nearest){
00295 
00296                  boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<RobotRef> > new_entry =
00297                                          boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<RobotRef> >
00298                                                  (new QueueEntry<RobotRef>((*it_robots)->robot().id(), dist) );
00299 
00300                  queue.push( new_entry );
00301                  farest_dist = queue.top()->dist();
00302 
00303              }else if(dist < farest_dist){
00304 
00305                  boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<RobotRef> > new_entry =
00306                                          boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<RobotRef> >
00307                                                  (new QueueEntry<RobotRef>((*it_robots)->robot().id(), dist) );
00308 
00309                  queue.pop();
00310                  queue.push( new_entry );
00311 
00312                  farest_dist  = queue.top()->dist();
00313              }
00314 
00315 
00316 
00317          }
00318 
00319 
00320      } else { // not a leaf
00321 
00322          // get the number f the child we are in,
00323          // so we visit the nearest node first
00324          int child_iam_in = octree->point_in_node(pos);
00325 
00326          get_nearest_robots_Rec(octree->child( child_iam_in ), pos, num_nearest, queue,id );
00327 
00328          // we might have to check other nodes too
00329          for( int num_child = 0; num_child < 8; ++num_child ){
00330 
00331              // check whether we have visited this node already
00332              if(num_child == child_iam_in)
00333                  continue;
00334 
00335              // until now we have not found enough robots
00336              // so we have to visit the cild anyway
00337              if(queue.size() <  num_nearest ){
00338 
00339                  get_nearest_robots_Rec(octree->child( num_child ), pos, num_nearest,queue, id );
00340 
00341              } else {
00342                  // get the distance to the robot which is farest away
00343                  float farest_dist = queue.top()->dist();
00344 
00345                  // only visit the child if there might be a nearer robot than thos found so far
00346                  if(octree->child( num_child )->calculate_dist_to_node( pos ) < farest_dist ){
00347                      get_nearest_robots_Rec( octree->child( num_child ) , pos, num_nearest, queue, id );
00348                  }
00349 
00350              }
00351          }
00352 
00353 
00354 
00355      }
00356 
00357  }

00359 std::set<OctreeUtilities::MarkerRef> OctreeUtilities::get_nearest_markers(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree> &octree,
00360                                                                          const Vector3d &pos,
00361                                                                          std::size_t num_nearest) {
00362 
00363      // create an empty queue
00364      PriorityQueue<MarkerRef>::Type queue;
00365 
00366      // find nearest robots
00367      get_nearest_markers_Rec(octree, pos,num_nearest, queue);
00368 
00369      // calculate the set
00370      std::set<MarkerRef> found_markers;
00371 
00372      while(!queue.empty() ){
00373          found_markers.insert( MarkerRef(queue.top()->id() ) );
00374          queue.pop();
00375 
00376      }
00377 
00378 
00379      return found_markers;
00380 
00381 
00382  }
00383 
00384 void OctreeUtilities::get_nearest_markers_Rec(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree>& octree,
00385                                              const Vector3d &pos,
00386                                              std::size_t num_nearest,
00387                                              PriorityQueue<MarkerRef>::Type & queue){
00388 
00389     // leaf
00390      if( octree->sub_divided() == false ){
00391 
00392          // get the robot datas stored in this node and an iterator for them
00393          std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers = octree->marker_information();
00394 
00395          std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> >::iterator it_markers;
00396 
00397          std::size_t num_markers_found = queue.size();
00398 
00399          float farest_dist = 99999999;
00400 
00401          if(num_markers_found > 0){
00402              farest_dist  = queue.top()->dist();
00403          }
00404 
00405          // check all robots in this node
00406          for(it_markers = markers.begin(); it_markers != markers.end(); ++it_markers){
00407 
00408              Vector3d robot_pos = (*it_markers)->position();
00409              float x = pos(0) - robot_pos(0);
00410              float y = pos(1) - robot_pos(1);
00411              float z = pos(2) - robot_pos(2);
00412 
00413              float dist = std::sqrt(x*x + y*y + z*z );
00414 
00415              if(num_markers_found < num_nearest){
00416 
00417                  boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<MarkerRef> > new_entry =
00418                                     boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<MarkerRef> >
00419                                             (new QueueEntry<MarkerRef>(
00420                                                     reinterpret_cast<const MarkerRef &>((*it_markers)->id())
00421                                                     , dist) );
00422 
00423                  queue.push(new_entry );
00424                  farest_dist = queue.top()->dist();
00425 
00426 
00427              }else if(dist < farest_dist){
00428 
00429                  boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<MarkerRef> > new_entry =
00430                                     boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<MarkerRef> >
00431                                                     (new QueueEntry<MarkerRef>(
00432                                                          reinterpret_cast<const MarkerRef &>((*it_markers)->id() )
00433                                                         , dist) );
00434                  queue.pop();
00435                  queue.push( new_entry );
00436 
00437                  farest_dist  = queue.top()->dist();
00438              }
00439 
00440 
00441 
00442          }
00443 
00444 
00445      } else { // not a leaf
00446 
00447          // get the number f the child we are in,
00448          // so we visit the nearest node first
00449          int child_iam_in = octree->point_in_node(pos);
00450 
00451          get_nearest_markers_Rec(octree->child( child_iam_in ), pos, num_nearest, queue );
00452 
00453          // we might have to check other nodes too
00454          for( int num_child = 0; num_child < 8; ++num_child ){
00455 
00456              // check whether we have visited this node already
00457              if(num_child == child_iam_in)
00458                  continue;
00459 
00460              // until now we have not found enough robots
00461              // so we have to visit the cild anyway
00462              if(queue.size() <  num_nearest ){
00463 
00464                  get_nearest_markers_Rec(octree->child( num_child ), pos, num_nearest,queue );
00465 
00466              } else {
00467                  // get the distance to the robot which is farest away
00468                  float farest_dist = queue.top()->dist();
00469 
00470                  // only visit the child if there might be a nearer robot than thos found so far
00471                  if(octree->child( num_child )->calculate_dist_to_node( pos ) < farest_dist ){
00472                      get_nearest_markers_Rec( octree->child( num_child ) , pos, num_nearest, queue );
00473                  }
00474 
00475              }
00476          }
00477 
00478 
00479 
00480      }
00481 
00482  }

00486 std::set<OctreeUtilities::ObstacleRef> OctreeUtilities::get_nearest_obstacles(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree> &octree,
00487                                                                          const Vector3d &pos,
00488                                                                          std::size_t num_nearest) {
00489 
00490      // create an empty queue
00491      PriorityQueue<ObstacleRef>::Type queue;
00492 
00493      // find nearest robots
00494      get_nearest_obstacles_Rec(octree, pos,num_nearest, queue);
00495 
00496      // calculate the set
00497      std::set<ObstacleRef> found_obstacles;
00498 
00499      while(!queue.empty() ){
00500          found_obstacles.insert( ObstacleRef(queue.top()->id() ) );
00501          queue.pop();
00502 
00503      }
00504 
00505 
00506      return found_obstacles;
00507 
00508 
00509  }

00511 
00512 void OctreeUtilities::get_nearest_obstacles_Rec(const boost::shared_ptr<Octree>& octree,
00513                                              const Vector3d &pos,
00514                                              std::size_t num_nearest,
00515                                              PriorityQueue<ObstacleRef>::Type & queue){
00516 
00517     // leaf
00518      if( octree->sub_divided() == false ){
00519 
00520          // get the robot datas stored in this node and an iterator for them
00521          std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles = octree->obstacles();
00522 
00523          std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> >::iterator it_obstacles;
00524 
00525          std::size_t num_obstacles_found = queue.size();
00526 
00527          float farest_dist = 99999999;
00528 
00529          if(num_obstacles_found > 0){
00530              farest_dist  = queue.top()->dist();
00531          }
00532 
00533          // check all robots in this node
00534          for(it_obstacles = obstacles.begin(); it_obstacles != obstacles.end(); ++it_obstacles){
00535 
00536              Vector3d robot_pos = (*it_obstacles)->position();
00537              float x = pos(0) - robot_pos(0);
00538              float y = pos(1) - robot_pos(1);
00539              float z = pos(2) - robot_pos(2);
00540 
00541              float width = octree->determine_obstacle_max_size( (*it_obstacles) );
00542              float dist = std::sqrt(x*x + y*y + z*z ) - width;
00543 
00544              if(num_obstacles_found < num_nearest){
00545 
00546                  boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<ObstacleRef> > new_entry =
00547                                     boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<ObstacleRef> >
00548                                             (new QueueEntry<ObstacleRef>(
00549                                                     reinterpret_cast<const ObstacleRef &>((*it_obstacles)->id())
00550                                                     , dist) );
00551 
00552                  queue.push(new_entry );
00553                  farest_dist = queue.top()->dist();
00554 
00555 
00556              }else if(dist < farest_dist){
00557 
00558                  boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<ObstacleRef> > new_entry =
00559                                     boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<ObstacleRef> >
00560                                                     (new QueueEntry<ObstacleRef>(
00561                                                          reinterpret_cast<const ObstacleRef &>((*it_obstacles)->id() )
00562                                                         , dist) );
00563                  queue.pop();
00564                  queue.push( new_entry );
00565 
00566                  farest_dist  = queue.top()->dist();
00567              }
00568 
00569 
00570 
00571          }
00572 
00573 
00574      } else { // not a leaf
00575 
00576          // get the number f the child we are in,
00577          // so we visit the nearest node first
00578          int child_iam_in = octree->point_in_node(pos);
00579 
00580          get_nearest_obstacles_Rec(octree->child( child_iam_in ), pos, num_nearest, queue );
00581 
00582          // we might have to check other nodes too
00583          for( int num_child = 0; num_child < 8; ++num_child ){
00584 
00585              // check whether we have visited this node already
00586              if(num_child == child_iam_in)
00587                  continue;
00588 
00589              // until now we have not found enough robots
00590              // so we have to visit the cild anyway
00591              if(queue.size() <  num_nearest ){
00592 
00593                  get_nearest_obstacles_Rec(octree->child( num_child ), pos, num_nearest,queue );
00594 
00595              } else {
00596                  // get the distance to the robot which is farest away
00597                  float farest_dist = queue.top()->dist();
00598 
00599                  // only visit the child if there might be a nearer robot than thos found so far
00600                  if(octree->child( num_child )->calculate_dist_to_node( pos ) < farest_dist ){
00601                      get_nearest_obstacles_Rec( octree->child( num_child ) , pos, num_nearest, queue );
00602                  }
00603 
00604              }
00605          }
00606 
00607 
00608 
00609      }
00610 
00611  }
